title: Kotoko is not conducting justify your inclusion, it is an observational search Opoku Nti
text:
Sports News | 14 October 2015 19:40 CET Kotoko is not conducting justify your inclusion, it is an observational search – Opoku Nti - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
According to him, the club has gro2n past the times when it organizes such exercises and that it will be proper if people will describe it as an observational search. 
Speaking to Ghanasoccernet.com, Opoku Nti noted that the club is undertaken the search based on the request of the head coach of the club who maintains that it is a strategic way of unearthing talents. 
“We are not doing a justify your inclusion. It is an observational search. That is upon the request of the head coach David Duncan.” 
“The coach has explained to us that he does that at every club he goes and has discovered many talents including Black Stars midfielder Mubarak Wakasu.” 
“We are not doing a justify since Kotoko is bigger than that. It is an observational search and it must be noted as such,” he concluded.
